The claim made by Rep: Jim McDermott, D-Wash., that earning the minimum wage wouldn't get you half the way to the poverty level.
The incorrect dollar amount mentioned in: 7.75 instead of the actual federal minimum wage of $7.25).
The calculation made to determine if ear: 7.75 an hour for 40 hours a week and 52 weeks a year would be less than half the poverty level.
